Checkbox list example

  • {{ item.title }} 
{{ this.result | json }}
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.scss"], }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { list: any[] | undefined; ngOnInit() { this.list = [ { id: 1, title: "Администратор", checked: true, image: "https://d3ljy8tbxzb0o6.cloudfront.net/freigestellte-produktbilder/image-thumb__29123__product_image_listing_tile/V412645-632-19.png", }, { id: 2, title: "Пользователь", checked: false, }, { id: 3, title: "Директор", checked: true, }, { id: 4, title: "Начальник", checked: false, }, ]; } get result() { return this.list?.filter((item) => item.checked); } }
